feedback.title: About Type I and II Errors

description.p: Please answer the questions below. Your response will not be graded, but will be available for your instructor to read. Answering these questions may also shape the discussions in class.

likert_series.prompt: Evaluate your ability to perform each of the following tasks. In other words, how well can you do each task?

item.prompt: Identify type I and type II errors, in context.
Explain how to reduce the likelihood of type I and type II errors, in context.

open_response.prompt: What concept or topic is the least clear to you at this point?
Please write any other questions you would like the instructor to address in class.
